text.raa_core.no_addon_screen.title: No RAA Addon Loaded!
text.raa_core.no_addon_screen.message.1: No RAA Addon has been found!
text.raa_core.no_addon_screen.message.2: RAA-Core alone doesn't add any content to the game.
text.raa_core.no_addon_screen.message.3: You can find a list of available addons at:
